name: Batch Export Config
query: SELECT Id, Name, NU__ExportGenerator__c, NU__ExternalID__c FROM NU__BatchExportConfiguration__c

name: Committee Position

name: Payment Methods

name: Price Classes

name: Entities

name: Configuration
query: SELECT Id, Name, NU__CustomConfiguration__c, NU__Entity__c, NU__Module__c, NU__Notes__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__Type__c, NU__Value__c FROM NU__Configuration__c

name: GL Accounts
query: SELECT Id, Name, NU__Entity__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__Name__c, NU__Status__c FROM NU__GLAccount__c

name: Entity Crossover

name: Bank Accounts
query: SELECT Id, Name, NU__Entity__c, NU__BankGLAccount__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__Status__c FROM NU__BankAccount__c

query: SELECT Id, NU__PaymentMethod__c, NU__Entity__c, NU__BankAccount__c, NU__ExternalID__c FROM NU__EntityPaymentMethod__c

query: SELECT Id, NU__Entity__c, NU__CreditCardIssuer__c, NU__BankAccount__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__Status__c FROM NU__EntityCreditCardIssuer__c

name: Entity Order Items shipping
query: SELECT Id, NU__Entity__c, NU__OrderItemConfiguration__c, NU__ARGLAccount__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__ShippingGLAccount__c FROM NU__EntityOrderItem__c WHERE NU__ShippingGLAccount__c != null

query: SELECT Id, NU__Entity__c, NU__OrderItemConfiguration__c, NU__ARGLAccount__c, NU__ExternalID__c FROM NU__EntityOrderItem__c WHERE NU__ShippingGLAccount__c = null

name: Event Session Groups
query: SELECT Id, Name, NU__Event__c, NU__Description__c, NU__DisplayOrder__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__SessionSelectionRequired__c FROM NU__EventSessionGroup__c

name: Committees
query: SELECT Id, Name, NU__AvailableTitles__c, NU__CommitteeShortName__c, NU__Description__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__FullDescription__c, NU__Status__c, NU__TermMonths__c, NU__Type__c FROM NU__Committee__c

name: Deferred Revenue Methods
query: SELECT Id, Name, RecordTypeId, NU__DeferredRevenueGLAccount__c, NU__DaysFromEventStartDate__c, NU__DeferredScheduleCalculatorClass__c, NU__EventRecognition__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__MembershipRecognition__c, NU__RecordTypeName__c FROM NU__DeferredRevenueMethod__c

name: Products

name: Products with Events
query: SELECT Id, NU__Event2__c FROM NU__Product__c WHERE NU__Event2__c != null

name: Products with session groups
query: SELECT Id, NU__EventSessionGroup__c FROM NU__Product__c WHERE NU__EventSessionGroup__c != null

name: Products with Deferred
query: SELECT Id, NU__DeferredRevenueMethod__c FROM NU__Product__c WHERE NU__DeferredRevenueMethod__c != null

name: Special Prices
query: SELECT Id, NU__DefaultPrice__c, NU__EarlyPrice__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__LatePrice__c, NU__PriceClasses__c, NU__Product__c FROM NU__SpecialPrice__c

name: Event Questions
query: SELECT Id, NU__Event__c, NU__DisplayOrder__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__IsRequired__c, NU__QuestionText__c, NU__Type__c, NU__RegistrationTypes__c From NU__EventQuestion__c

name: Event Question Options
query: SELECT Id, NU__EventQuestion__c, NU__DisplayOrder__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__OptionText__c FROM NU__EventQuestionOption__c

name: AR Aging

name: Sales Tax

name: Membership Types
query: Select Id, Name, NU__Entity__c, NU__AccountJoinOnField__c, NU__AccountMembershipField__c, NU__AccountingMethod__c, NU__AnnualStartMonth__c, NU__AutoRenewRepricingDaysBeforeRenewal__c, NU__Category__c, NU__DaysBeforeExpiration__c, NU__Description__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__FlowdownManagerClass__c, NU__GracePeriod__c, NU__IsAutoRenew__c, NU__IsFlowdownEnabled__c, NU__ProrationOverride__c, NU__RenewalType__c, NU__SelfServiceEnabled__c, NU__StartDateControl__c, NU__Status__c, NU__Term__c FROM NU__MembershipType__c

name: Proration Rules
query: SELECT Id, Name, NU__Description__c, NU__ExternalID__c FROM NU__ProrationRule__c

name: Proration Rule Items
query: SELECT Id, NU__ProrationRule__c, NU__AdvanceTerm__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__PercentageAmount__c, NU__TermMonth__c FROM NU__ProrationRuleItem__c

name: Membership Type Product Links
query: SELECT Id, NU__MembershipType__c, NU__Product__c, NU__Category__c, NU__DisplayOrder__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__IsQuantityEditable__c, NU__ParentLink__c, NU__PriceOverride__c, NU__Purpose__c, NU__SelfServiceEnabled__c, NU__Stage__c, NU__Status__c, NU__TermOverrideMonths__c FROM NU__MembershipTypeProductLink__c

query: SELECT Id, NU__ProrationRule__c FROM NU__MembershipTypeProductLink__c WHERE NU__ProrationRule__c != null

name: Org Accounts
query: SELECT Id, Name, Type, RecordTypeId, ParentId, BillingStreet, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingPostalCode, BillingCountry, BillingLatitude, BillingLongitude, ShippingStreet, ShippingCity, ShippingState, ShippingPostalCode, ShippingCountry, ShippingLatitude, ShippingLongitude, Phone, Fax, Website, Industry, NumberOfEmployees, Description, NU__AccountBalance__c, NU__AccountID__c, NU__AccountMoneySpent__c, NU__CasualName__c, NU__CommunicationPreference__c, NU__CopyFromMailingToBilling__c, NU__CopyFromMailingToOther__c, NU__CopyFromMailingToShipping__c, NU__CopyFromPrimaryAffiliationBilling__c, NU__CreditBalance__c, NU__Designation__c, NU__Ethnicity__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__FacebookAccount__c, NU__Gender__c, NU__JoinOn__c, NU__LastLogin__c, NU__LegacyID__c, NU__LinkedInAccount__c, NU__MarkForDelete__c, NU__MiddleName__c, NU__OtherEmail__c, NU__OtherFax__c, NU__PasswordHash__c, NU__PasswordSalt__c, NU__PersonEmail__c, NU__PrimaryContactEmail__c, NU__PrimaryContactName__c, NU__PrimaryEntity__c, NU__PrimaryLocationQualityCode__c, NU__PrimaryLocation__Latitude__s, NU__PrimaryLocation__Longitude__s, NU__RecoveryAnswer1__c, NU__RecoveryAnswer2__c, NU__RecoveryAnswer3__c, NU__RecoveryQuestion1__c, NU__RecoveryQuestion2__c, NU__RecoveryQuestion3__c, NU__SecurityGroup__c, NU__Status__c, NU__Suffix__c, NU__TaxExemptId__c, NU__TaxExempt__c, NU__TotalAffiliateBalance__c, NU__TotalAffiliateMoneySpent__c, NU__TwitterAccount__c, NU__UpdatePrimaryLocation__c, NU__Username__c, NU__ValidEmailDomains__c FROM Account WHERE NU__SandboxEnabled__c = true AND IsPersonAccount = false

name: Accounts
query: SELECT Id, LastName, FirstName, Salutation, Type, RecordTypeId, ParentId, BillingStreet, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingPostalCode, BillingCountry, BillingLatitude, BillingLongitude, ShippingStreet, ShippingCity, ShippingState, ShippingPostalCode, ShippingCountry, ShippingLatitude, ShippingLongitude, Phone, Fax, Website, Industry, NumberOfEmployees, Description, PersonTitle, PersonDepartment, PersonAssistantName, PersonLeadSource, PersonBirthdate, PersonEmailBouncedReason, PersonEmailBouncedDate, NU__AccountBalance__c, NU__AccountID__c, NU__AccountMoneySpent__c, NU__CasualName__c, NU__CommunicationPreference__c, NU__CopyFromMailingToBilling__c, NU__CopyFromMailingToOther__c, NU__CopyFromMailingToShipping__c, NU__LegacyID__c, NU__LinkedInAccount__c, NU__MarkForDelete__c, NU__MiddleName__c, NU__OtherEmail__c, NU__OtherFax__c, NU__PasswordHash__c, NU__PasswordSalt__c, NU__PersonEmail__c, NU__PrimaryContactEmail__c, NU__PrimaryContactName__c, NU__PrimaryContact__c, NU__PrimaryEntity__c, NU__PrimaryLocationQualityCode__c, NU__PrimaryLocation__Latitude__s, NU__PrimaryLocation__Longitude__s, NU__RecoveryAnswer1__c, NU__RecoveryAnswer2__c, NU__RecoveryAnswer3__c, NU__RecoveryQuestion1__c, NU__RecoveryQuestion2__c, NU__RecoveryQuestion3__c, NU__SecurityGroup__c, NU__Status__c, NU__Suffix__c, NU__TaxExemptId__c, NU__TaxExempt__c, NU__TotalAffiliateBalance__c, NU__TotalAffiliateMoneySpent__c, NU__TwitterAccount__c, NU__UpdatePrimaryLocation__c, NU__Username__c, NU__ValidEmailDomains__c, NU__ExternalID__pc FROM Account WHERE NU__SandboxEnabled__c = true  AND IsPersonAccount = true

name: Affiliations
query: SELECT Id, NU__Account__c, NU__DoNotFlowdownAddress__c, NU__EndDate__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__IsCompanyManager__c, NU__IsPrimaryContact__c, NU__IsPrimary__c, NU__ParentAccount__c, NU__RemovalDate2__c, NU__RemovalDate__c, NU__RemovalReason__c, NU__Role__c, NU__Search__c, NU__StartDate__c, NU__Status__c FROM NU__Affiliation__c WHERE NU__ParentAccount__r.NU__SandboxEnabled__c = true AND NU__Account__r.IsPersonAccount = true AND NU__Account__r.NU__SandboxEnabled__c = true

name: Memberships
query: SELECT Id, NU__Account2__c, NU__AutoRenew__c, NU__AutomaticRenewalCreated__c, NU__AutomaticRenewalDuesAmount__c, NU__CustomerEmail__c, NU__EndDateOverride__c, NU__EndDate__c, NU__EntityName__c, NU__ExternalAmount__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__MembershipType2__c, NU__Pending__c, NU__PrimaryContactEmail__c, NU__PrimaryContactName__c, NU__RecurringPayment__c, NU__Search__c, NU__StartDate__c, NU__PrimaryMembershipProduct__c From NU__Membership__c WHERE NU__Account2__r.NU__SandboxEnabled__c = true

name: Subscriptions
query: SELECT Id, NU__Account2__c, NU__Product2__c, NU__CustomerEmail__c, NU__EndDate__c, NU__EntityName__c, NU__ExternalAmount__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__Search__c, NU__StartDate__c FROM NU__Subscription__c WHERE NU__Account2__r.NU__SandboxEnabled__c = true

name: Donations
query: Select Id, NU__Account2__c, NU__Product2__c, NU__CustomerEmail__c, NU__EntityName__c, NU__ExternalAmount__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__Search__c FROM NU__Donation__c WHERE NU__Account2__r.NU__SandboxEnabled__c = true

name: Committee Memberships
query: SELECT Id, NU__Account2__c, NU__Committee2__c, NU__CommitteePosition__c, NU__EndDate__c, NU__ExternalID__c, NU__MemberEmail__c, NU__Search__c, NU__StampedState__c, NU__StartDate__c, NU__SupportingOrganization__c FROM NU__CommitteeMembership__c WHERE NU__Account2__r.NU__SandboxEnabled__c = true AND NU__SupportingOrganization__r.NU__SandboxEnabled__c = true
